New Records: Cade Cunningham tied an NBA season-high in first-half assists with ten, joining Nikola Jokic, James Harden, and Domantas Sabonis.
Cade Cunningham achieved his third straight triple-double.
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham made a game-winning basket with a little over ten seconds left.
Cade Cunningham blocked the final shot to secure the Pistons' 122-121 victory.
Cade Cunningham recorded a triple-double with 22 points, 11 rebounds, and 13 assists.
Post-Match Reflections: NBA fans praised Cade Cunningham's performance, highlighting his clutch play and triple-double.
Cade Cunningham was celebrated as a clutch player and MVP candidate by fans on social media.
